TABLE.NAME: skillsaudit
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for skillsaudit, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course skillsaudit activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the skillsaudit activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade. Can be negative to indicate the use of a scale.

FIELD.NAME: options
FIELD.COMMENT: CSV of confidence rating options

FIELD.NAME: question
FIELD.COMMENT: Question students are asked when rating their confidence

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course the skill applies to

FIELD.NAME: number
FIELD.COMMENT: Skill reference ID from specification or scheme of work (e.g. 2.1)

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the skill

FIELD.NAME: link
FIELD.COMMENT: Link to more info about this skill

FIELD.NAME: skillid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID number of the skill

FIELD.NAME: auditid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID number of the skillsaudit that this skill belongs to

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Order to display this skill (lower numbers shown before higher numbers)

TABLE.NAME: skillsauditrating
TABLE.COMMENT: Rating for confidence in a skill

FIELD.NAME: auditid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the skills audit

FIELD.NAME: skillid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the skill

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user currently being rated

FIELD.NAME: confidence
FIELD.COMMENT: Confidence rating for this skill

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when this rating was applied

FIELD.NAME: comment
FIELD.COMMENT: User written comment to go alongside this rating

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: user id of the student receiving feedback

FIELD.NAME: fromid
FIELD.COMMENT: user id of the teacher leaving feedback

FIELD.NAME: auditid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the skillsaudit this feedback relates to

FIELD.NAME: skillid
FIELD.COMMENT: optional skill id

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: date and time the feedback was left

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: feedback message
